scripts.install-dist: (rm -r genkit-packages || true) && mkdir genkit-packages && cp -r ../../../../dist/* genkit-packages && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-common-0.0.2.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-ai-0.0.2.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-flow-0.0.2.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-providers-0.0.2.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-plugin-firebase-0.0.2.tgz && npm i --save ./genkit-packages/google-genkit-plugin-vertex-ai-0.0.2.tgz
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
